content: Place `road-tee.glb` at (2,0,0) with rotation for stem South (+Z).
Place `road-tee.glb` at (2,0,4) with rotation for stem North (-Z).
Place `road-tee.glb` at (0,0,2) with rotation for stem East (+X).
Place `road-tee.glb` at (4,0,2) with rotation for stem West (-X).
Place `road-bend.glb` at (0,0,0) with rotation to connect East (+X) and South (+Z). (Rotation: [0, 270, 0])
Place `road-bend.glb` at (0,0,4) with rotation to connect East (+X) and North (-Z). (Rotation: [0, 0, 0])
Place `road-bend.glb` at (4,0,0) with rotation to connect West (-X) and South (+Z). (Rotation: [0, 180, 0])
Place `road-bend.glb` at (4,0,4) with rotation to connect West (-X) and North (-Z). (Rotation: [0, 90, 0])
